snippet.title: Spirittea - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Not only will fans of Spirittea get to see new gameplay in this trailer, but they will also be treated to a look at the game's spirit friends. Inspired in equal measure by iconic life sim Stardew Valley, and classic spirit-focused anime and manga, Spirittea follows a writer who has escaped to the countryside in order to clear their head and find inspiration for their next novel. However, after accidentally drinking from an old mystical teapot, our protagonist begins to see the spirit world overlapping with their reality.

#GameTrailers
